00001 #include "ldense.h"
00002 
00003 /* dense logical Matrices "ldenseMatrix" classes --- almost identical to
00004  * dense nonzero-pattern: "ndenseMatrix" ones
00005  */
00006 
00007 /* this is very close to dspMatrix_as_dsy* () in ./dspMatrix.c : */
00008 SEXP lspMatrix_as_lsyMatrix(SEXP from, SEXP kind)
00009 {
00010     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS((asInteger(kind) == 1) ?
00011                                              "nsyMatrix" :
00012                                              "lsyMatrix"))),
00013         uplo = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_uploSym),
00014         dimP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym),
00015         dmnP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00016     int n = *INTEGER(dimP);
00017 
00018     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00019     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dmnP));
00020     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo));
00021     packed_to_full_int(LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, n*n)),
00022                        LOGICAL( GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n,
00023                        *CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo, 0)) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW);
00024     UNPROTECT(1);
00025     return val;
00026 }
00027 
00028 /* this is very close to dsyMatrix_as_dsp* () in ./dsyMatrix.c : */
00029 SEXP lsyMatrix_as_lspMatrix(SEXP from, SEXP kind)
00030 {
00031     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS((asInteger(kind) == 1) ?
00032                                              "nspMatrix" :
00033                                              "lspMatrix"))),
00034         uplo = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_uploSym),
00035         dimP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym);
00036     int n = *INTEGER(dimP);
00037 
00038     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00039     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo));
00040     full_to_packed_int(
00041         LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, (n*(n+1))/2)),
00042         LOGICAL( GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n,
00043         *CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo, 0)) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW, NUN);
00044     UNPROTECT(1);
00045     return val;
00046 }

00048 /* this is very close to dtpMatrix_as_dtr* () in ./dtpMatrix.c : */
00049 SEXP ltpMatrix_as_ltrMatrix(SEXP from, SEXP kind)
00050 {
00051     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS((asInteger(kind) == 1) ?
00052                                              "ntrMatrix" :
00053                                              "ltrMatrix"))),
00054         uplo = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_uploSym),
00055         diag = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_diagSym),
00056         dimP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym),
00057         dmnP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00058     int n = *INTEGER(dimP);
00059 
00060     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00061     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dmnP));
00062     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_diagSym, duplicate(diag));
00063     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo));
00064     packed_to_full_int(LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, n*n)),
00065                        LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n,
00066                        *CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo, 0)) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW);
00067     UNPROTECT(1);
00068     return val;
00069 }

00071 /* this is very close to dtrMatrix_as_dtp* () in ./dtrMatrix.c : */
00072 SEXP ltrMatrix_as_ltpMatrix(SEXP from, SEXP kind)
00073 {
00074     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS((asInteger(kind) == 1) ?
00075                                              "ntpMatrix" :
00076                                              "ltpMatrix"))),
00077         uplo = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_uploSym),
00078         diag = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_diagSym),
00079         dimP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym);
00080     int n = *INTEGER(dimP);
00081 
00082     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00083     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_diagSym, duplicate(diag));
00084     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo));
00085     full_to_packed_int(
00086         LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, (n*(n+1))/2)),
00087         LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n,
00088         *CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo, 0)) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW,
00089         *CHAR(STRING_ELT(diag, 0)) == 'U' ? UNT : NUN);
00090     UNPROTECT(1);
00091     return val;
00092 }

00094 /* this is very close to dtrMatrix_as_dge*() :*/
00095 SEXP ltrMatrix_as_lgeMatrix(SEXP from, SEXP kind)
00096 {
00097     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS((asInteger(kind) == 1) ?
00098                                              "ngeMatrix" :
00099                                              "lgeMatrix")));
00100 
00101     slot_dup(val, from, Matrix_xSym);
00102     slot_dup(val, from, Matrix_DimSym);
00103     slot_dup(val, from, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00104     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_factorSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 0));
00105 
00106     make_i_matrix_triangular(LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), from);
00107     UNPROTECT(1);
00108     return val;
00109 }

00122

00125     UNPROTECT(1);
